sentences.en: Duke was soundly defeated in this month's Louisiana governor's race.
sentences.cn: 杜克在本月的路易斯安那州长竞选中大败而归。

sentences.en: It is unlikely that the Duke was convinced by such specious arguments.
sentences.cn: 公爵不太可能相信这种似是而非的论点。

sentences.en: It was nice to read that the Duke will not be sending his son off to boarding school.
sentences.cn: 得知公爵不会把儿子送到寄宿学校真让人高兴。

sentences.en: John Major and the Duke of Edinburgh led the mourners.
sentences.cn: 约翰·梅杰和爱丁堡公爵走在送葬队伍前面。

sentences.en: Lord Luce's capitulation to pressure from the Duke of Edinburgh has stored up huge problems for the future.
sentences.cn: 卢斯勋爵迫于爱丁堡公爵的压力作了让步，为日后埋下了巨大隐患。

sentences.en: The duke first went into tails at only fifteen.
sentences.cn: 这位公爵十五岁时就开始穿燕尾服了.

sentences.en: The duke is understandably proud of Lady Helen and her achievements.
sentences.cn: 公爵为海伦女士和她的成就感到自豪，这很容易理解。

sentences.en: The Duke of Clarence will be there, and many of your grander friends.
sentences.cn: 克拉伦斯公爵将会到场，还有你许多牛不可及的朋友亦将出席。

sentences.en: The Duke resents being seen as a moneyed idler.
sentences.cn: 公爵对别人把他看作钱包鼓鼓、游手好闲的人感到气愤。

sentences.en: The Duke signed away his inheritance.
sentences.cn: 公爵签字放弃继承遗产。

sentences.en: The duke was the king's most trusted adviser.
sentences.cn: 公爵是国王最信赖的顾问.

sentences.en: The Duke's study was very masculine, with deep red wall-covering and dark oak shelving.
sentences.cn: 公爵的书房颇具阳刚气，深红色墙纸，深色的橡木搁板。

sentences.en: The plaintiffs in Duke Power challenged the constitutionality of the Price - Anderson Act.
sentences.cn: 原告“杜克电力公司”对《普莱斯一 安德森法 》的合宪性提出质疑.

words.tran_cn: 公爵的爵位；公爵的领地
[纸]公爵，（公国的）君主；公爵（种）樱桃

phrases.tran_cn: (北美，非正式)打个明白，打个输赢

trans.tran_cn: 公爵，君主，<俚>(pl.)拳头，[植]公爵樱桃
trans.tran_en: a nobleman of the highest rank
